title: Enhancing Hospitality Practical Skills: Self-Directed Learning Competencies in Science Through Online Self-Coaching

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can establish and execute self-directed learning plans at least once a week using an online self-coaching tool.
Learners can improve learning strategies by writing reflective journals during the problem-solving process in science.
Learners can enhance their scientific experiment design and analysis skills by over 20% based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
